title: Lee Strobel - The Case for a Creator (Documentary)
description:
Original Uploaders Comments:

This 60-minute program is a compelling adaptation of Lee Strobel&#039;s personal journey from atheism to faith in GodÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ a journey in search of the truth about intelligent design in the universe.

During his academic years, Lee became convinced that God was outmoded, a belief that colored his ensuing career as an award-winning journalist at the Chicago Tribune. Science made the idea of a Creator irrelevantÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ or so Strobel thought.

Has science discovered God? At the very least, it&#039;s giving faith an immense boost as new findings emerge about the incredible complexity of life and our universe. In The Case for a Creator DVD, Strobel reexamines the theories that once led him away from God.

Highlighted by spectacular computer animation, The Case for a Creator DVD is a remarkable film in which you&#039;ll encounter the mind-stretching discoveries from cosmology, cellular biology, DNA research, astronomy, physics, and human consciousness.

This video provides amazing and irrefutable evidence that points to a Divine Creator. This is a great video for any of you who are proponents of Darwin&#039;s theories... because if you TRULY value keeping an open mind, this is the compelling "other side of the argument" that you don&#039;t often hear. I hope that you&#039;ll choose to watch this and to come to your own conclusions afterward. 

If you are a believer then watch this video to build up your faith. It will cement your faith in the word of God, the Bible and what it preaches.

Kindly Seed for as long as possible. According to the Bible, faith the size of a mustard seed can move mountains...so keep seeding and moving mountains of unbelief. :-)

Uploaded by Indian Christian
